entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
